snippet: The American International Group’s former chief executive is moving ahead with a lawsuit against the federal government over its $182 billion rescue of the insurer — even without the backing of the company itself.
abstract: The American International Group’s former chief executive is moving ahead with a lawsuit against the federal government over its $182 billion rescue of the insurer — even without the backing of the company itself.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Greenberg Forges Ahead With Lawsuit Over A.I.G. Bailout
